title: US High-Grade Corporate Bond Spreads Hit Fresh Three Decade Low
description: A key measure of credit risk reached the lowest level since the late 1990s on Thursday, after geopolitical tensions cooled and fears of a global economic slowdown abated.
content: A key measure of credit risk reached the lowest level since the late 1990s on Thursday, after geopolitical tensions cooled and fears of a global economic slowdown abated.
